name: getOrder
description: For the fastest results use the FDC provided `id` however you can use your `merchantOrderId` as the `id`.

merchantId.description: Providing your `merchantId` indicates the `id` is your `merchantOrderId`. Although it is not necessary to provide this it will speed up your results when using your `merchantOrderId` however it will slow your results when using the FDC provided `id`

hydrate.description: Adds additional information to the response, uses a CSV format for multiple values.'
